text: Sawsi (Quechua for willow or a species of willows, Hispanicized spelling Sauce) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru. It is situated in the Arequipa Region, Castilla Province, on the border of the districts of Chachas and Orcopampa. Sawsi lies at a lake named Machuqucha.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Caylloma Province 1 (Arequipa Region) ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Sawsi
